generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and crosswalks, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible along the sides of the road, particularly on the right side where pedestrians are walking.
- building: Buildings are present on both sides of the street, including a large building on the right with multiple windows and a shuttered storefront.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the street, especially on the left side and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the street.
- car: Several cars are parked along the right side of the street, and a few are visible driving or parked on the left side.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection, including one on the right side of the image.
- traffic sign: Traffic signs are visible, including a directional sign on the right side of the street and a circular sign on the left side.
- pole: Poles are visible throughout the image, including traffic light poles and sign poles.
- terrain: Small patches of terrain, such as grass or soil, are visible along the edges of the road and sidewalks.
